titleStmt.title: A treatise of blazing starres in generall As well supernaturall as naturall: to what countries or people soeuer they appeare in the spacious world.
Super huis anni post Christum natum M.D.XXXI. & quolibet alio cometa exploratio. English
titleStmt.author: Nausea, Friedrich, d. 1552.
Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: imprinted by Bernard Alsop, and are to be sold by Edward Wright at his shoppe neere Christ Church Gate,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Alexander Fleming, of: Nausea, Friedrich. Super huis anni post Christum natum M.D.XXXI. & quolibet alio cometa exploratio.
Running title reads: A treatise in generall of blazing starres.
A variant of the edition with "sold by Henry Bell" in imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe neere Christ Church Gate
